tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE politicians (
    politician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    party TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_platforms (
    platform_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiments (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentiment_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_text TEXT,
    politician_id INT,
    platform_id INT,
    sentiment_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE engagements (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    reactions INT,
    comments INT
)
